author: Reuters Editorial
title: National Milk HY Turnover From Cont Ops Rises​
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - NATIONAL MILK RECORDS PLC:
* ‍HY TURNOVER FOR CONTINUING OPERATIONS SUBSTANTIALLY INCREASED TO £10.5 MILLION (“M”) (2016: £9.4M)​
* HY ‍PROFIT ON ORDINARY ACTIVITIES, BEFORE TAXATION, OF £957,000 (2016: £442,000)​
* ‍GENERAL OUTLOOK FOR UK DAIRY IS ONE OF SOFTENING MILK PRICES DURING 2018 CAUSED BY INCREASING MILK SUPPLY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
